mapper.sql: goods_id,goods_type_id, goods_name, goods_text, goods_price, goods_discount, goods_discount_price, goods_sales, goods_inventory, status, recommended_status, integral_status, coupons_status, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT g.goods_name goodsName, g.goods_text goodsText, g.goods_content goodsContent, g.goods_price goodsPrice, g.goods_discount goodsDiscount, g.goods_discount_price goodsDiscountPrice, g.goods_sales goodsSales, g.goods_inventory goodsInventory, g.status status, g.recommended_status recommendedStatus, g.integral_status integralStatus, g.coupons_status couponsStatus, g.create_time createTime, g.update_time updateTime, gm.url url, k.key_name keyName, v.value_name valueName, t.type_name typeName FROM t_shop_goods g INNER JOIN t_shop_goods_images gm ON g.goods_id = gm.goods_id INNER JOIN t_shop_goods_type t ON g.goods_type_id = t.shop_goods_type_id LEFT JOIN t_shop_goods_sku gs ON g.goods_id = gs.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_shop_sku s ON gs.shop_sku_id = s.shop_sku_id LEFT JOIN t_shop_sku_key k ON s.sku_key_id = k.shop_sku_key_id LEFT JOIN t_shop_sku_value v ON s.sku_value_id = v.shop_sku_value_id WHERE g.goods_id = #{goodsId}
